ui.description: Select the programming language for syntax highlighting
Select a file from /reuse/code/ (includes subdirectories)

defaultItem.text: This text will appear when conditions are met.

ui.description: Content will show when these conditions are met
Content will show for these languages (e.g., en, fr, es)

fields.name: requireBothConditions
fields.label: Require Both Condition AND Language Conditions

ui.description: When true, both condition and language conditions must be satisfied
Optional text to show when conditions are not met
Display debugging information (for development)
Select a glossary term key from the Glossary Terms collection
Select a file from /reuse/snippets/ (includes subdirectories)

fields.name: value
fields.label: Tab Value
fields.description: Unique identifier for this tab

fields.name: label
fields.label: Tab Label
fields.description: Display text for the tab button

fields.name: default
fields.label: Default Tab
fields.description: Set this tab as the default selected tab

fields.name: deactivate
fields.label: Do not modify this string or you will not be able to edit this topic in the rich text editor.
Active
fields.name: active
fields.description: Whether this condition is currently active/available

collections.name: homepage
collections.label: Home Page
collections.description: To see settings changes reflected on your site, you must restart the Tina CLI after saving changes (local development only).

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: By default this is the site title

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle
fields.description: By default this is the site tagline

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Additional text displayed below the subtitle

fields.name: showHeroCard
fields.label: Show Hero Card
fields.description: Display the visual hero card with features

fields.name: value
fields.label: Tab Value
fields.description: Unique identifier for this tab

fields.name: label
fields.label: Tab Label
fields.description: Display text for the tab button

fields.name: default
fields.label: Default Tab
fields.description: Set this tab as the default selected tab

fields.name: deactivate
fields.label: Do not modify this string or you will not be able to edit this topic in the rich text editor.
Default Mode
fields.name: defaultMode
fields.description: The color mode that is applied by default

fields.label: Hide Switch
fields.name: disableSwitch
fields.description: Hide the switch in the navbar

fields.label: Respect Prefers Color Scheme
fields.name: respectPrefersColorScheme
fields.description: Use prefers-color-scheme CSS media feature

fields.label: Project Name
fields.name: projectName
fields.description: GitHub repository name for GitHub Pages deployment

fields.label: Organization Name
fields.name: organizationName
fields.description: GitHub username or organization name

fields.label: API Name
fields.name: name
fields.description: Unique name for this API (e.g., petstore, userapi, etc.)

fields.label: Spec Path
fields.name: specPath
fields.description: Path to the OpenAPI specification file (e.g., apis/petstore.yaml)

fields.label: Output Directory
fields.name: outputDir
fields.description: Directory where generated API docs will be placed (e.g., docs/api/petstore)

fields.label: Download URL
fields.name: downloadUrl
fields.description: Optional URL to download the OpenAPI spec file

fields.label: Group Paths By
fields.name: groupPathsBy
fields.description: How to group API endpoints in sidebar

fields.label: Category Link Source
fields.name: categoryLinkSource
fields.description: Source for category links

fields.label: Language Tabs
fields.name: languageTabs
fields.description: Select which programming languages to show as tabs in OpenAPI code examples across all APIs

fields.label: Additional Languages
fields.name: additionalLanguages
fields.description: Programming languages supported for syntax highlighting

fields.label: Magic Comments
fields.name: magicComments
fields.description: Comments that trigger special highlighting behaviors

fields.label: Line Comment
fields.name: line
fields.description: Comment text that triggers highlighting on the next line

fields.label: Block Comment
fields.name: block
fields.description: Comments that define a block of highlighted lines

fields.label: Light Theme
fields.name: theme
fields.description: Syntax highlighting theme for light mode

fields.label: Dark Theme
fields.name: darkTheme
fields.description: Syntax highlighting theme for dark mode

fields.label: Site URL
fields.name: siteUrl
fields.description: The URL where your site will be hosted

fields.label: Base URL
fields.name: baseUrl
fields.description: Base URL for your site (e.g., /my-project/). Leave empty for root domain.

fields.label: Trailing Slash
fields.name: trailingSlash
fields.description: Whether to add trailing slashes to URLs
